blog_items.title: An Elephant, a photograph, a drawing.
blog_items.description: This is one of several drawings by Rembrandt of female elephants in different poses. This elephant may even be one called Hansken, a female despite her name, known to have been in Holland in 1641. Behind and to the right of the animal are the outlines of three figures.

blog_items.title: Militia Company of District II under the Command of Captain Frans Banninck Cocq, Known as de Night Watch
blog_items.description: The painting may be more properly titled by its long since forgotten name The Company of captain Frans Banning Cocq and lieutenant Willem van Ruytenburch preparing to march out. In the 18th century the painting became known as the Night Watch, in 19th century it continued to be known as the Night Watch and in the 20th century "the Night Watch" was still the name of the painting.  So far the name has not been altered in the 21st century. The painting may be more properly titled by its long since forgotten name The Company of captain Frans Banning Cocq and lieutenant Willem van Ruytenburch preparing to march out. blog_items.title: The Anatomy Lesson of Dr. Nicolaes Tulp
blog_items.description: Janet is not related to Joe Bloggs (or Nicolaes Tulp).  The Anatomy Lesson of Dr. Nicolaes Tulp is a 1632 oil painting on canvas by Rembrandt housed in the Mauritshuis museum in The Hague, the Netherlands. Dr. Nicolaes Tulp is pictured explaining the musculature of the arm to medical professionals. Some of the spectators are checking their phones.
blog_items.label: Art History

blog_items.title: Self portrait
blog_items.description: Self-portrait with dishevelled hair is an early self-portrait by the Dutch artist Rembrandt, now in the Rijksmuseum. It dates to 1628 and is an exercise in chiaroscuro. Self-portrait with dishevelled hair is an early self-portrait by the Dutch artist Rembrandt, now in the Rijksmuseum. It dates to 1628 and is an exercise in chiaroscuro. blog_items.title: Belshazzars Feast
blog_items.description: Belshazzar's Feast is a painting by Rembrandt. Its source comes from the story of Belshazzar and the writing on the wall in the Old Testament Book of Daniel. It is held in the The National Gallery, London. Belshazzar's Feast is a painting by Rembrandt. Its source comes from the story of Belshazzar and the writing on the wall in the Old Testament Book of Daniel. It is held in the The National Gallery, London. blog_items.title: The Stoning of Saint Stephen
blog_items.description: The Stoning of Saint Stephen is the first painting by Dutch artist Rembrandt, painted in 1625 at the age of 19.
